body_html:
On a related but similar issue I was told that those kind of checks are impossible to do on GPU. i still believe that there should be a way to do some warining.

body:
On a related but similar issue I was told that those kind of checks are impossible to do on GPU. i still believe that there should be a way to do some warining.
